Presentation of the project

Project Ether is a mobile video game of dungeon management and exploration. You play as a character with supernatural abilities and you must create dungeons as well as explore those of other players or those created by the developers. All this in a fantasy world.

Technology

The technology used are docker-composer to virtualize the project and framework python django with azure for hosting.

Installating

Requirements:

You need for this project to have docker-composer installed on your machine:

install docker-compose

Note

install depends of your package manager.

Project Execution

At the root of the repository to launch the project:

docker-compose build && docker-compose up

Or

docker-compose up --build

In the dashboard folder to launch the units tests:

./manage.py test

Enjoy yourself!
